page.title: 15Local News.
page.content: Most farmers exhibit at the Highland {Show}in Edinburgh, during the month of June and obtain a high number of prizes. Some also exhibit at the Angus Show, in Arbroath, in July. Barn{Dances}are sometimes held on the farms and they are convivial affairs where the community can meet. At present there is a suggestion before the{ Community Council}to provide a pavement from the row of Council houses to the School. In the area there is a flourishing { {plumber's}business, which is carried on by the plumber from his home. This busines consists moslty of heating installations in Solid Fuel, Gas and Oil.
